title: Login error
body: When I try to login, my client says Authenticating, then says "Unable to Connect to Login Queue". My ID is eulho.

replies.body: Oh thank god I'm not the only one where I can't get in login queue. also the login music isn't working for me?  So everyone here also can't connect to login queue?
Watch as a Riot Employee posts about how it's a problem on your end and nothing wrong with the client. (Also having this bs problem)
Same issue，hope Riot could solve it ASAP.
I'm also getting the same thing. Went on a losing spree last night to wake up to this, "Unable to connect to the login queue".
Getting the exact same thing. Played a bunch last night. Woke up to play some more, "Unable to Connect to the login queue"
i have the same issue right now.

It looks like we might have been having some issues with our login servers earlier this morning, but looking over the comments it seems like everyone was eventually able to get logged back in!

Please let me know in a reply if you're still having problems connecting to the login servers so that I can help troubleshoot that issue and gather some data in case this is widespread!!

Its been 5 days now i think so i can't login into LOL. 2 days before, league started to have lagging issue than was hard to log in. I had to restart my pc than try few time . Im stuck on authenticating forever. I uninstall the game twice, the second time, patch won't start....cool. stuck a 3% then nothing. It came suddenly, in a middle of a game, get kick out cause it said my internet wasnt working perfectly, but from that side everything is alright. Is it a coincidence that i just download Player Unknow battleGround ???? i tried everything nothing work. What would it be the problem if it came from my ISP? what should i tell him to know it's not from them?
Just got in too at 10:59 PST.  did nothing different, just worked. Thanks riot for whatever you did.{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
I disabled login animation and music and it worked for me but maybe i just got lucky

Yeup it works on both accounts guys. Um I would recommend just try to take down your music volume and doing any setting that increases game performance. I did all that, and made sure my dns and all that was fine. Hope you guys work it out, I'm gonna check on this board and keep you updated if nothing works
cant login either. Bump for Demacia
So i just got in, I'm not sure why, but it's the wrong account I'm gonna try again and let you guys know if it works.
Having the same issue here! I had a windows update last night, but thats never caused issues for me before. =(
If anyone actually is able to login after leaving their post, please let the rest of us know.  Riot may individually fix it for folks who post.

This scenario has happened several times in the past.  You can find the threads by searching this topic in Google..
It is nothing Riot hasn't done in the past and there doesn't seem to be any kind of fix for it.  Some have said that it never comes back and riot looses players. So far the only fix i have heard working was changing default browser away from google chrome or disabling game music in settings.  neither of which worked for me..  Profit or performance riot. GJ.
samesies....save us ritooooo we wanna do our missions
